resources.string: I measured my child\'s fever near his exit to the educational institution, and it was found that his body temperature was below 38 degrees Celsius.

My child does not cough and has no breathing difficulties, except for a cough or difficulty breathing due to a chronic condition such as asthma or allergy. For this purpose, rhinitis alone will not be considered a symptom.
To the best of my knowledge, my child have no change in their sense of taste or smell.
To the best of my knowledge my child has not been in close contact with a COVID-19 patient in the last two weeks.
My child has not been in the last 14 days in a country whose returnees are committed to isolation.
Please fill in the details and sign the health statement.
